DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a user can be blocked from the home screen long press menu
NAME: Block user in conversation list @android @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the in-app review prompt shows after the user sets a different theme
NAME: Review prompt Appearance trigger @android @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a user can set a nickname for a contact and that it appears correctly in the conversation settings, conversation header and home screen.
NAME: Set nickname @android @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that an emoji reaction can be sent and is received in a 1-1 conversation.
NAME: Send emoji react 1:1 @android @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that 'Disappear After Send' works as expected in a 1:1 conversation
NAME: Disappear after send @android @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that joining a community works and the conversation syncs to a linked device
NAME: Join community test @android @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies the in-app review modal texts and buttons for the positive flow (Enjoying Session - Rate App)
NAME: Review prompt positive flow @android @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the in-app review prompt shows after the user presses the Donate button in Settings
NAME: Review prompt Donate trigger @android @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the STF donation link is correct and that the HTTP request is successful (200)
NAME: Donate linkout @android @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that an emoji reaction can be sent and is received in a group.
NAME: Send emoji react groups @android @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that Disappearing Messages can be set in a group conversation, and that a message disappears after the specified expiry time.
NAME: Disappear after send groups @android @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that 'Disappear After Read' can be set in a 1:1 conversation, and that a message disappears after the specified expiry time.
NAME: Disappear after read @android @high-risk @2-devices
Create group and change name syncs @android @high-risk @4-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that turning off Disappearing Messages works as expected in a 1:1 conversation
NAME: Disappear after send off 1:1 @android @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a blocked user syncs to a linked device
NAME: Block user linked device @android @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION:
Verifies voice call functionality and permission flow:
    - Verifies strings of all call permission prompts (microphone, notifications, etc.)
    - Verifies missed call notifications when recipient lacks permissions
    - Confirms successful call connection once both users enable permissions
    - Verifies control messages after call is finished
    Note that due to the nature of virtual devices, no actual "talking" takes place
NAME: Voice calls @android @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a user can be blocked from the conversation settings
NAME: Block user in conversation settings @android @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the in-app review prompt shows after the user visits the Path screen in Settings
NAME: Review prompt Path trigger @android @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies the in-app review modal texts and buttons for the negative flow (Enjoying Session - Give Feedback - Open URL)
NAME: Review prompt negative flow @android @high-risk @1-devices
